title: The Magic Between Us
description: When These Worlds CollideCecelia Hewitt has lived her whole life in the land of the fae, and she dreams of a future with her childhood sweetheart, Marcus Thorne. When Marcus is called upon to dwell in the human world, it means leaving Cecelia behind and breaking both their hearts.More Than Sparks May FlyMarcus was groomed for leadership in the land of the fae, but now that he has found his human parents, he will inherit his father's title and position in the British tonâ€”and he will marry a human. As love and passion continue to burn between Cecelia and Marcus, the question remains: Can two people fated for different worlds find one to share?
author: Tammy Falkner
